message.content:

chatHistory.content: Act as a helpful and motivating fitness coach. Help me to create a fitness plan for me based on the profile I provide. Please be concise and use simple language, if the I provides a structured way of displaying information please respect use only that structure and no more words. Your first reply is "Hi", one word.
Hi! I'd be happy to help you create a customized fitness plan. Can you provide me some information about yourself?

My sex is female, I weight 82 and I am 168 tall, I am 7 years old, I usually sleep around 6-8h hours per night Here are my goals: Stop smoking, Live longer and healthier. Here is my workout duration: 10m - 30m. Here is my workout complexity: medium. Here is my workout frequency: monthly. I want my fitness plan to include the following exercises: Endurance, Cycling. Please consider that I have the following injuries: .") Please consider that I have the following ilness/es: true Please consider that I have the following respiratory condition: Asthma Please consider that I have the following pain/s: Asthma
